title: Master Yi - 2.0 Million Mastery Points Montage - League of Legends

embed.title: Master Yi - 2.0 Million Mastery Points Montage - League of Legends
embed.description: Hello guys, here finally is the long awaited Master Yi Montage for you, enjoy it! Shoutout's: Big thanks to Gregami (The Voice of PROJECT: Yi): https://twitter.com/greg_chun Used Music: Two Steps From Hell: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3swwxiALG5c0Tvom83tPGg Syrex: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeZje_7vr6CPK9vPQDfV3WA Those channels really do have awesome music, so go check them out!

body:
Hello guys, i'm releasing a big yi montage @ 13:00 and i'd like everyone who's interested to at check it out.

I've put alot of work into it with good plays, decent music (can't hit everybodys taste tho) and even a special feat. guest related to Yi.

Here's a link to the Video, you can enable notifications to get reminded.
